results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በውስጧ እሸት ባለ ሺፋኖች የኾኑ ዘንባባዎችም ያሉባት ስትኾን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: የገለባ ባለቤት የኾነ ቅንጣትም፡፡ ባለ መልካም መዐዛ ቅጠሎችም (ያሉባት ስትኾን)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: (ሰዎችና ጋኔኖች ሆይ!) ከጌታችሁም ጸጋዎች በየትኛው ታስተባብላላችሁ?
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ሰውን እንደ ሸክላ ከሚቅጨለጨል ደረቅ ጭቃ ፈጠረው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
